message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget. Let me know what you think!

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your business, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my original asking price. I'm willing to come down to $13,500 for the product. This still represents a great value for you, and I believe it's a fair price considering its worth.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement!

Hi Alice, I understand that you're still hoping to get closer to your original asking price, but I'm not willing to go above $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13,250 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product. Let me know what you think!
